trans-unit.source: Represents an XML document that specifies a list of file system directory paths that should not be searched for references to add to a Web services discovery document.

The DynamicDiscoveryDocument class is employed by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler> class's <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> method, which handles an HTTP request for a discovery document.
The request specifies another document, an XML dynamic discovery document containing a list of directories to exclude.

The list corresponds to the DynamicDiscoveryDocument class's <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DynamicDiscoveryDocument.ExcludePaths%2A> property and contains directories at or below the directory containing the XML document.
Normally, none of these classes need to be used directly by a developer.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DynamicDiscoveryDocument"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the file-system directory paths that should not be searched for references to add to a discovery document.
The exclude paths are serialized to an XML dynamic discovery document.
Deserializes an XML document into a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DynamicDiscoveryDocument"></xref> instance.
This `static` method takes an XML document, represented as a <xref:System.IO.Stream>, and converts in to a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DynamicDiscoveryDocument> .
A <xref:System.IO.Stream> object from which the XML dynamic discovery document is deserialized.
Contains the dynamic discovery document namespace "urn:schemas-dynamicdiscovery:disco.2000-03-17".
Serializes a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DynamicDiscoveryDocument"></xref> instance into an XML document specified as an output stream.
A <xref:System.IO.Stream> object to which the XML dynamic discovery document is serialized.
